channel.title: CDS Global
channel.description: CDS Global is a customer-centric, technology-driven, global company that delivers effective solutions for our strategic partners across multiple industries.
channel.copyright: 2013 CDS Global, Inc. All rights reserved.

item.title: eHub: Your Digital Entitlement Engine
item.description: Learn how eHub, CDS Global's online subscription billing and entitlement management platform meets the demands of the digital marketplace across industries. See just a few of the many ways eHub can help monetize your digital assets in Chief Product Officer Kristin Runayn's demonstration.

item.title: Message from Malcolm
item.description: CDS Global's Chairman and CEO Malcolm Netburn discusses how technology is like oxygen – at the center of our business – and essential for survival.

item.title: Client Q and A
item.description: Read a fun, informative Q and A with Monica Ray, executive vice president of consumer marketing at Conde Nast.

item.title: Postal Perspectives
item.description: The U.S. Postal Service has a number of changes planned for implementation in January 2013. This summary highlights changes that are pertinent to CDS Global mailers.

item.title: Product Management Corner
item.description: Learn about CDS Global's new and upcoming features to make your business run moother, such as continuously updated product roadmaps and enhancements to our Web Service Gateway, Trigger Marketing, Prospect Database and more.
